info.name: API Project Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for the Laravel API Project

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Test User",         // required, string, max:255
    "email": "test@example.com", // required, valid email, unique
    "password": "password123",   // required, min:8
    "password_confirmation": "password123", // required, must match password
    "phone": "1234567890",      // required, string, max:20
    "address": "123 Test St"    // optional, string, max:255
}

request.description: Register a new user in the system

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "message": "User registered successfully",
    "user": {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "Test User",
        "email": "test@example.com",
        "phone": "1234567890",
        "address": "123 Test St",
        "is_active": true,
        "created_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z"
    },
    "token": "1|example_token_string"
}

request.description: Login with email and password to get access token
Logout and invalidate the current access token
Get authenticated user's details
Request a password reset link to be sent to the user's email

response.name: Success Response
Validation Error

request.description: Reset user's password using the token received via email

response.name: Validation Error

body.raw:
{
    "name": "New User",           // required, string, max:255
    "email": "new@example.com",   // required, valid email, unique
    "password": "password123",     // required, min:8
    "password_confirmation": "password123", // required, must match password
    "phone": "1234567890",        // required, string, max:20
    "address": "123 Street",      // optional, string, max:255
    "role": "user",              // optional, enum: admin,user (default: user)
    "is_active": true             // optional, boolean (default: true)
}

{
    "name": "Updated Name",       // optional, string, max:255
    "email": "update@example.com", // optional, valid email, unique
    "phone": "9876543210",        // optional, string, max:20
    "address": "New Address",      // optional, string, max:255
    "role": "admin",              // optional, enum: admin,user
    "is_active": false             // optional, boolean
}

formdata.value: This is a test event description
This is the full content of the test event

formdata.description: required, at least 1 photo, image file (jpeg,png,jpg,gif), max:2MB each
required, date, must be after or equal to start_date

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "message": "Event created successfully",
    "data": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Test Event",
        "slug": "test-event",
        "description": "This is a test event description",
        "content": "This is the full content of the test event",
        "photos": ["events/photos/photo1.jpg", "events/photos/photo2.jpg"],
        "photos_urls": [
            "http://your-domain.com/storage/events/photos/photo1.jpg",
            "http://your-domain.com/storage/events/photos/photo2.jpg"
        ],
        "start_date": "2024-06-01",
        "end_date": "2024-06-02",
        "event_time": "10:00:00",
        "venue": "Test Venue",
        "link": "https://example.com/event",
        "status": 1,
        "featured": 0,
        "event_type": "conference",
        "created_at": "2024-06-21T05:15:00.000000Z",
        "updated_at": "2024-06-21T05:15:00.000000Z"
    }
}

formdata.value: This is an updated test event description
This is the updated full content of the test event

formdata.description: required, at least 1 photo, image file (jpeg,png,jpg,gif), max:2MB each
required, date, must be after or equal to start_date

request.description: Get a list of all active events (no authentication required)
Delete a donation record
Get total amount and count of completed donations
Get the 5 most recent completed donations
Get a list of active categories with their active galleries

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "current_page": 1,
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
                "name": "Events",
                "description": "Event photos",
                "status": "active",
                "created_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z",
                "updated_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z",
                "galleries": [
                    {
                        "id": 1,
                        "title": "Summer Event",
                        "description": "Photos from summer event",
                        "image_path": "gallery/summer-event.jpg",
                        "image_url": "http://localhost:8000/storage/gallery/summer-event.jpg",
                        "status": "active",
                        "category_id": 1,
                        "created_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z",
                        "updated_at": "2024-05-25T11:00:00.000000Z"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ],
        "first_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/categories/active?page=1",
        "from": 1,
        "last_page": 1,
        "last_page_url": "http://localhost:8000/api/categories/active?page=1",
        "next_page_url": null,
        "path": "http://localhost:8000/api/categories/active",
        "per_page": 10,
        "prev_page_url": null,
        "to": 1,
        "total": 1
    }
}

request.description: Get a paginated list of activity logs with filtering options

response.body:
{
    "status": "success",
    "data": {
        "current_page": 1,
        "data": [
            {
                "id": 1,
